description: Waterfront living in Grand Lakes! Set on a serene lake with a walking trail, this home captures sweeping water views from the family room, breakfast area, and luxe first-floor primary suite. An open layout features tile flooring, arched openings, a fireplace, and an island kitchen with abundant cabinetry and a breakfast bar. Work and play spaces abound with a private study, plus an upstairs game room and adjacent flex/office with built-ins. Two secondary bedrooms share a Jack-and-Jill bath; a third is served by a nearby full bath. The primary retreat offers a curved wall of windows and a spa-style bath with dual vanities, soaking tub, glass shower, and an oversized custom closet. Outside: a large covered patio and sparkling pool & spa with removable safety fence, all framed by an iron fence to the lake. Major updates: roof (2023) and AC (2022). Never flooded. Enjoy Grand Lakes’ parks, lakes, trails and resort-style pools. Schedule your private tour today!
